DOC.brief_summary: Objective : Evaluate Pharmacokinetics determine safety GM-CSF single dose inhalation . Study Design : Pharmacokinetic open study
DOC.brief_title: SK-1401 ( rhGM-CSF Agent Inhalation ) GM-CSF Inhalation Pharmacokinetic Study
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects judge appropriate study attend physician 2. provide sign informed consent . aPAP patient must meet follow 3. aPAP patient age 20 80 year old ( date registration ) 4. aPAP severity mild moderate . ( severe ) Healthy volunteer must meet follow 5 . Japanese healthy male subject age 20 45 year old ( date registration ) . 6 . BMI ( Body mass index ) 18 25 . 1 . WBC 12,000/mcl 2 . Fever 38 degree celsius 3 . History malignant disease within recent 5 year ( apply treat case local basal cell carcinoma ) 4 . Complication severe cardiovascular disease include congestive heart failure , angina pectoris , hemorrhagic tendency , etc . 5 . Complication respiratory disease pulmonary infectious disease ( incl . pulmonary tuberculosis ) , interstitial pneumonitis , lung fibrosis bronchiectasis , evaluation safety GMCSF therapy consider difficult . 6 . History complication infectious disease require systemic administration antibiotic , antifungal antiviral agent within recent 2 week . 7. liver dysfunction 8. renal dysfunction 9 . Previous experience severe unexplained adverse event aerosol delivery kind medicinal product 10 . Positive HIVAb , HBsAg , HCVAb , STS TPHA 11. allergic GMCSF . 12. addicted illegal drug 13 . Participation clinical trial within 12 week registration . 14. smoking within 5 year 15. follow procedure define protocol aPAP patient must exclude follow 16 . Pregnant possibly pregnant woman , lactate woman , woman desire become pregnant study period 17 .
